KafkaSender
KafkaListener
ExperimentalListenersListenerKAFKA
Experimental IListener for listening to a topic in a Kafka instance. The Kafka integration is still under development so do not currently use unless you wish to participate in this development.
See also
Github - KafkaListener Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.extensions.kafka.KafkaListener
Syntax
Copy
<KafkaListener />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
groupId	text	-
The group id of the consumer
patternRecheckInterval	number	-
How often to check for new topics when using Patterns. (in MS)
topics	text	-
The topics to listen to as comma-separated list. Regular expressions are supported, for instance: example.*.
name	text	-
The functional name of the object.
